title: Donald Trump backs down on New York quarantine proposal
description: US President Donald Trump backs away from plans to quarantine coronavirus hotspots New York, New Jersey and Connecticut, instead putting in place a "strong travel advisory" in a bid to stem the spread of the virus.
content:
Updated 
March 29, 2020 19:14:45
US President Donald Trump has backed away from plans to quarantine coronavirus hotspots New York, New Jersey and Connecticut, instead putting in place a "strong travel advisory" in a bid to stem the spread of the virus.
